citations.narrative:
The licensee is not following the vaccination protocol outlined in the Program of Veterinary Care. The licensee has been
administering the distemper and parvovirus vaccines on an earlier schedule than what is listed in the PVC. Failure to
provide vaccinations on the schedule approved by the Attending (AV) cannot ensure that adequate and proper veterinary
care is being provided. The licensee must administer the distemper and parvovirus vaccines on the approved schedule or
work with the AV to revise the vaccination schedule. The AV must approve any changes to the vaccination schedule.
Correct by October 6, 2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
3.13(a)(3) 
   
Veterinary care for dogs. 
The licensee is not following the vaccination protocol outlined in the Program of Veterinary Care. The licensee has been 
administering the distemper and parvovirus vaccines on an earlier schedule than what is listed in the PVC. Failure to 
provide vaccinations on the schedule approved by the Attending (AV) cannot ensure that adequate and proper veterinary 
care is being provided. The licensee must administer the distemper and parvovirus vaccines on the approved schedule or 
work with the AV to revise the vaccination schedule. The AV must approve any changes to the vaccination schedule. 
Correct by October 6, 2023. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n
